title: AbstractMempoolTransaction
description: Abstract transaction. This schema makes up all properties common between all Stacks 2.0 transaction types

tx_status.description: Status of the transaction in the mempool. Can be pending in the mempool. Or dropped from the mempool from being replaced by a transaction with the same nonce but a higher fee, replaced by a transaction with the same nonce but in the canonical fork, the transaction is too expensive to include in a block, or because it became stale.

receipt_time.description: A unix timestamp (in seconds) indicating when the transaction broadcast was received by the node.

receipt_time_iso.description: An ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) timestamp indicating when the transaction broadcast was received by the node.
